It was the odd one out in the Orange Box. What was this thing called Portal. Even though the game doesn't have more than 5-6 hours play time, they are huge amounts of fun. The portal gun is a great toy which you'll steadily have to use in more than just you're run of the mill way. Great game and fantastic deal if you buy the Orange Box.

Get this game in one of the many steam sales, offered either as Valve complete, Orange Box, or as Portal complete.

Recommended, rated 8 out of 10.
Conectavelmente intrigantes!

Portal is one of those games that you never actually thought would get made. It's different, it's challenging, and the writing is sharp. Indeed, Portal (and its sequel) might well be one of the funniest games I have ever played. Not the kind of easy laughs that come from something like Grand Theft Auto, but real clever dark humor, gallows wit. GlaD0S is a remarkable antagonist, discouraging and insulting at every turn, but you can't help but like her. It's not a very long campaign, but with such a great script and solid premise, why drag the gameplay out, right?

Great game with a good and captivating story, and fun puzzles that really make you think. It occasionally causes rage - normally due to over-playing, or under-thinking. Overall I give this game 4.5/5 stars :)

This game is really great but Portal 2 brings a lot more to the table. You could start with Portal 2 and play this later. Finially download the third party dlc Portal:Prelude, which takes place before Portal 1 and is very difficult.
Not much content compared to Portal 2, but a good game nontheless.

Замечательная игра. 10/10
Пусть даже сингл и недостаточно длителен, но эта игра отличная. Если соберетесь брать Portal 2, берите и первую часть, чтобы основательно ознакомиться с игровой механикой и имеющимся сюжетом.
В наличии есть усложненные сингловые карты и различные испытания (на использование минимального числа порталов, на прохождение с минимумом шагов и на время)
К ней также есть очень выигрышные моды, как Prelude и Flash Mappack. Дополнений множество.
A masterpiece :)

В основе Portal лежит весьма оригинальная идея, изложенная в самом названии. С помощью портальной пушки нам предсоит решить не одну голооломку. Эта игра навсегда останется в истории, как феноменальный проект, а в сердцах поклонников, как неповторимая игра.

No ano que foi lançado (out/2007),a menor nota apos milhares de avaliaçôes foi 8.2 pela IGN e uma das explicações era "muito pouco tempo para um jogo muito criativo".Esse jogo não tem igual e é para ser jogado.
Does anyone not have this game yet? If by some miracle you don't, you really should.
An absolute classic!
Fantastic game using the HL2 engine. Its puzzles due to their nature can be solved using a good variation of methods. However the game does feel a little short, then again there is always Portal 2 :)

One of the most satisfying games I've ever played. It's rewarding gameplay, it's great features and, above all, it's great story. I love this game in more ways than one. After a lot of effort, I'd absolutely recommend this game to anyone that enjoys FPS and Puzzle solving, it's been, so far, one of my greatest experiences in PC gaming.
A perfect game. Is there any other?

A very charming puzzle platformer. While the game is short, lasting a few hours, the way Valve set up the mechanics in the game, and the way the puzzles are set up make for a very fun experience. There are very few moments where you feel like you don't know what you're doing, and need to look up a walkthrough. If you somehow don't have this game by this point, just get it.
Great game! Fun puzzle game with a funny story line, that is very captivating. If you haven't played this game yet you're missing out! It's SOOO FUN!!

Keeps you in suspense, gets more challenging and mysterious as you go, and pretty fun I think! I recommend this to people who like challenging, suspensful, and futuristic games! Plus, who could resist with such a low price for such an epic game?
Deff worth at least 1 playthrough

This and Portal 2 are, personally, my favorite first-person shooters, if you can call them that.
